Text:
use rhdl::prelude::*;

#[test]
#[ignore]
fn test_build_flash() -> miette::Result<()> {
    const PCF: &str = "
set_io dips[0] H11
set_io dips[1] G11
set_io dips[2] F11
set_io dips[3] E11
set_io dips[4] D11
set_io dips[5] D10
set_io dips[6] G1
set_io dips[7] D9
set_io leds[0] E12
set_io leds[1] D14
set_io leds[2] F12
set_io leds[3] E14
    ";
    let mut fixture = Fixture::new("ones_top", ones::OneCounter {});
    bind!(fixture, dips -> input.val());
    bind!(fixture, leds -> output.val());
    rhdl_toolchains::icestorm::IceStorm::new("hx8k", "cb132", "build")
        .clean()?
        .build_and_flash(fixture, PCF)
}
